title: 深水埗懷疑有狗扮示威者

replies.msg:
有朋友喺深水埗長沙灣道北河街見到
私家車入面有盾牌 懷疑係反黑組嘅車
HDRC唔知係咩 不過google咗OCTB係反黑
車牌：CY3133

朋友send比我嘅時間係0204am
有無人係現場見到可以FC係咩人?
我都係代朋友po上黎 所以好多野都唔清楚

btw
香港人加油 萬事小心
推左先
應該係HQRC

唔好意思,借個位

應對被扣港獨帽子既策略
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
https://lih.kg/1423846
原來我自膠打錯咗
HQ= headquarter?

依照黑警計劃，一定會濫捕，挑起事端，引我哋出嚟再激發群眾，再拉人削弱我哋力量

大家保持理性，留意環境變化，主動上網搵資訊，不死守，不送頭，唔好波及冇武器嘅市民同財產
肯定係狗

replies.msg:
朋友話係白色車 對唔住黑色車車主
車牌：UY2745
我都見到有，但唔明佢地目的係咩，無影相，只係四圍望望。

唔止呢架 隔離果架都係
有個反黑組嘅袋同埋幾支水仲有一個行李喼

一定有 但識拆招更緊要 請入

見到班防暴做埋畜蟲既野，就諗起自己
https://lih.kg/1425253
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

replies.msg:
更新下資料
我frd啱啱話呢個懷疑係狗嘅人叫防暴警察守住佢架車
可能因為有手足覺得唔對路想打佢架車

同啲狗咁frd睇黎都似狗

港警隊高層架構一覽表
Organisation Chart of Force Headquarters Directorate
Key to Annexes and Appendices

ABDO - Assistant Bomb Disposal Officer
ACP - Assistant Commissioner of Police
AD/AS - Assistant Director, Accounting Services
AO - Administrative Officer
APWO - Assistant Police Welfare Officer
BDO - Bomb Disposal Officer
CEO - Chief Executive Officer
CIO - Chief Information Officer
CIP - Chief Inspector of Police
CMDT AUX - Commandant Auxiliary Police
CMSO - Chief Management Services Officer
CP - Commissioner of Police
CPCO - Chief Police Communications Officer
CPTR - Chief Police Translator
CSM - Chief Systems Manager
CSO - Chief Supplies Officer
CSP - Chief Superintendent of Police
CTE - Chief Telecommunications Engineer
D C&S - Director of Crime & Security
DCMDT AUX - Deputy CommandantAuxiliary Police
DCP MAN - Deputy Commissioner of Police(Management)
DCP OPS - Deputy Commissioner of Police(Operations)
DD - Dangerous Drugs
DFAP - Director of Finance,Administration & Planning
DMS - Director of Management Services
D OPS - Director of Operations
DPT - Director of Personnel & Training
EO - Executive Officer
FMTO - Force Motor Transport Officer
HKI - Hong Kong Island
ID - IdentityII - Illegal Immigrant
INFO - Information
KE - Kowloon East
KW - Kowloon West
MAR - Marine
NTN - New Territories North
NTS - New Territories South
ODFH - Object Dropped From Height
PTS - Police Training School
RC - Regional Commander
SACP - Senior Assistant Commissioner of Police
SOLO - Senior Official Language Officer
SEO - Senior Executive Officer
SFTO - Senior Force Training Officer
SFWO - Senior Force Welfare Officer
SGT - SergeantSIP - Senior Inspector of Police
SP - Superintendent of Police
SPCP - Senior Police Clinical Psychologist
SPEO - Senior Principal Executive Officer
SSM - Senior Systems Manager
SSP - Senior Superintendent of Police
STC - Senior Technical Consultant
STA - Senior Treasury Accountant
STE - Senior Telecommunications Engineer
TA - Treasury Accountant
UB - Uniform Branc
